inclusion.criterion: Normal health status (as determined by the Investigator review of medical history and blood donor physical exam)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Complete blood count (CBC; including RBC indices MCV, MCH, MCHC, and RDW) and serum chemistry values within normal limits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Minimum hemoglobin levels of 13 g/dL for female and 14 g/dL for male subjects
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative blood donor screening test panel for HIV, HBV, HCV, HTLV, Syphilis, WNV and Zika virus
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects of childbearing potential and male subjects must agree to use a medically acceptable method of contraception throughout the study periods
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Meet or exceed AABB guidelines for blood donation (with the exception of travel deferrals)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed and dated informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Up to 12 subjects will be enrolled for a maximum of 6 eligible subjects in the pilot study
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant acute or chronic disease (as determined by the Investigator)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of RBC autoantibodies/autoimmune hemolytic anemia, RBC alloantibodies or autoimmune disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of congenital red cell disorders including glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase (G6PD) deficiency
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Positive Direct (DAT) and Indirect antiglobulin test (IAT) at study entry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppressive therapy (e.g., oral or IV prednisone) within the past 28 days
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with any medication known to affect RBC viability
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Male subjects or female subjects of childbearing potential not using effective contraception
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has normal blood chemistry values and meets the inclusion criteria for age, health status, weight, CBC, serum chemistry, hemoglobin levels, and blood donor screening test panel.
